answers.author: William Lutz
answers.text:
In a previous community, we were statutorily responsible for cemetary maintenance and it was subsidized through our general fund.  We did establish funds for our cemetaries which were funded through donations in honor of those that were deceased.  For a small community, we received on average about $6,000.  Not a great amount, but it did help foot the bill when we improved the gravel paths in our cemetaries.
